title: The Promise
description: From New York Times bestselling author R.L. Mathewson comes the tenth installment in the Neighbor from Hell series…For readers who enjoy touching stories that make them smile, laugh, and fall in love.How far would you go to keep a promise?Reed Bradford never should have made that promise.He’d barely survived the first time around, but now she was back, his best friend’s little sister, his one-time neighbor, and the woman that he never should have promised to protect. He never should have done a lot of things, like cross that line, but once he did…There was no turning back.Joey Lawson always had a plan, but unfortunately, mostly for her, sometimes those plans backfired. On her. This time would be no different. After the unfortunate incident that she felt was better not to think about, she found herself doing the one thing that she’d never survive.Falling in love with a Bradford.
author: R.L. Mathewson
